data.text: @Iain_L @1874JJ I installed the test and track app, but there was no way I was going to use the passport one.

@Iain_L I’m still waiting for NS to answer my question about that, I asked if the answers were being considered as Scottish as a Yes vote and British as a no in an invisible referendum, I’m not expecting an answer this week, month or year!
@Iain_L @LauraBe36550188 Except that the sane amongst is wouldn’t trust the Scoattish Govt to build a wee boat…
